text: Suriya Chiarasapawong (born 7 August 1949) is a former Thai cyclist. He competed in the sprint and 1000 time trial events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Thai male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Thailand Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Suriya Chiarasapawong
